stories.text:
I can go to crunchbase and find companies in my space and see who is investing, but that is likely to expose me to most active investors.

I'm looking to get comprehensive list of pre-seed/seed funds, VCs, angel investors, and accelerator.

List of funds and angel investors seems to be the most difficult to find.
stories.title: Ask HN: Is there a comprehensive list of seed investors?

stories.text:
I have a simple accessibility utility for iOS that now has ~100 $0.99 monthly subscriptions, but its growing really slowly.

I have a free 7 day trial, that according to App Store Connect converts at 56% with an 86% retention rate. However these figures are based on 150 free downloads per month, which is really low.

What strategies can I use to increase the number of downloads the app gets in mid-2021?
stories.title: Ask HN: Scaling up from 100 iOS app subscriptions
